item.title: Single Parents Should Get as Much Paid Leave as Couples, Spanish Court Rules
item.description: The decision follows a constitutional court ruling that barred discrimination against babies born into single-parent families.

item.title: Spate of Violent Antisemitic Attacks Rattles Australia
